net.sourceforge.aglets.examples.mdispatcher
Class MethodDispatcher

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.aglets.examples.mdispatcher.MethodDispatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MethodDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

MethodDispatcher class binds a message and a corresponding method. All methods which has a signature method(Message msg); are binded and invoked when it receives the corresponding message. 

 MethodDispatcher mdispatcher = null;
 public void onCreation(Object obj){
 mdispatcher = new MethodDispatcher(this);
 }
 
 pubic boolean handleMessage(Message m) {
 return mdispatcher(m);
 }
 
 // This method is called when the message("doJob") is sent to the aglet.
 public void doJob(Message m) {
 // do your job.
 }
This may be incorporated with MessageManager in the future.

Version:
1.00 $Date: 2009/07/28 07:04:53 $
Author:
Mitsuru Oshima
